channel.title: Help with these two problems!
channel.description:
I've literally been looking for help for a few weeks... Why cant my server load the cache?? i downloaded the direct link and i get this when i go to extract to the c: drive
[code]! C:\Users\Jake\Downloads\cache2.zip: The archive is either in unknown format or damaged [/code]
What the fuck do i do??? this is the direct link the person who released the site used so im lost... no versions of windows/mac/Linux can download the cache form my server.....
Next when i run my server it says this:
[code][2011/11/10 13:48:17] [DarkScape]: DarkScape framework [2011/11/10 13:48:17] [DarkScape]: Loaded 15588item prices. [2011/11/10 13:48:17] [DarkScape]: Loading Server GUI... item.title: Help with these two problems!
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

I’ve literally been looking for help for a few weeks… Why cant my server load the cache?? i downloaded the direct link and i get this when i go to extract to the c: drive

! C:\Users\Jake\Downloads\cache2.zip: The archive is either in unknown format or damaged

What the fuck do i do??? this is the direct link the person who released the site used so im lost… no versions of windows/mac/Linux can download the cache form my server…
